description: A cienaCesLogicalPortNotificationPortDown trap signifies that the SNMP entity, acting in
an agent role, has detected that the link status has become operationally down
for one of its communication links.
To enable the device to send this notification:
- cienaCesPortEnhancedLinkTrapState needs to be set to enabled
- cienaCesPortAllTrapState needs to be set to enabled
- cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAllTrapState for the port needs to be set to enabled
- cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortLinkUpDownTrapState for the port needs to be set to enabled
These objects are set to enabled by default. Variable bindings include: cienaGlobalSeverity,
cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex, cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAdminState, cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortOperState,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortName, cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortType, cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortDesc,
sysName, and sysLocation.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortNotificationPortDown CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAdminState i 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortOperState i 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortType i 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortDesc s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-CHASSIS-MIB::cienaCesChassisSystemId s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigEttpAid s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortLastDownReason1 s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortLastDownReason2 s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortLastDownReason3 s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortMaskedDownReason s EXAMPLE

the zero-length string.

closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the
value is the zero-length string.

This field is undefined if the logical port maps to a LAG.

an agent role, has detected the link status has become operationally up for

description: A cienaCesPortNotificationPortSignalDegradeSet trap is raised when a
signal degrade condition is detected against the specified port.
This trap is enabled by default. Variable bindings include:
cienaGlobalSeverity,
cienaGlobalMacAddress,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAdminState,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortOperState,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortName,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortType,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortDesc
sysName
sysLocation
cienaCesChassisSystemId
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigEttpAid
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigSignalDegradeDetection

description: The TL1 AID of the ETTP object represented by this port.

variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigEttpAid

description: This object specifies if signal degrade detection is enabled
or disabled on the port. And if enabled, this object specifies
the technology of which signal degrade detection uses.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigSignalDegradeDetection

description: A cienaCesPortNotificationPortSignalDegradeClear trap is raised when
the signal degrade condition is cleared against the specified port.
This trap is enabled by default. Variable bindings include:
cienaGlobalSeverity,
cienaGlobalMacAddress,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex,
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex
cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAdminState,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortOperState,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortName,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortType,
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortDesc
sysName
sysLocation
cienaCesChassisSystemId
cienaCesLogicalPortConfigEttpAid.

event.Summary: Signal degrade condition cleared on port $v10

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortNotificationPortSignalDegradeClear CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex u 0 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber u 9999 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesChPortPgIdMappingNotifChannelNumber u 9999 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAdminState i 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortOperState i 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortType i 1 CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortDesc s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-CHASSIS-MIB::cienaCesChassisSystemId s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigEttpAid s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The object indicates the chassis index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifChassisIndex

description: The object indicates the shelf index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifShelfIndex

description: The object indicates the slot index for the port used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifSlotIndex

description: The object indicates the port number for the corresponding PGID
used for trap definition.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesPortPgIdMappingNotifPortNumber

description: The object indicates the channel number for the corresponding PgId
used for trap definition. The value 0 is used if the port is
not channelized.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesChPortPgIdMappingNotifChannelNumber

description: The administrative state of the port.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortAdminState

description: The current operational state of the port.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortOperState

description: A textual string containing information about the
port. This string should indicate the physical
location of the port as well.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortName

description: The port type for the port.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortType

description: This object specifies the port description.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigPortDesc

description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed
node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified
domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is
the zero-length string.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysName

description: The physical location of this node (e.g., 'telephone
closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the
value is the zero-length string.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation

description: This object indicates the system identification (SID) as provisioned by the operator through TL1.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-CHASSIS-MIB::cienaCesChassisSystemId

description: The TL1 AID of the ETTP object represented by this port.
This field is undefined if the logical port maps to a LAG.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PORT-MIB::cienaCesLogicalPortConfigEttpAid
